Intuit4.6
Group Development Manager, Risk and Fraud
Petah Tikva
Apply on employer site

Overview

Intuit is a global technology platform that helps our customers and communities overcome their most important financial challenges. We help give over 50 million consumers, small business, and self-employed customers around the world the opportunity to prosper.

Come join the QuickBooks Money team as a Group Development Manager.

In this role youll lead a team that creates innovative product and platform with a focus on financial fraud and risk management, helping small businesses to get paid faster. Team is working on new backend technologies, at the heart of QuickBooks. Youll collaborate closely with other teams to lead the strategy as well as drive the execution and bring it to life.

If you are passionate about leading engineers and building a world class platform, at a high scale, this is the opportunity for you!

What you'll bring

  • 5 plus years experience as an established technical leader of software engineering teams that have successfully delivered customer-driven software products.
  • Demonstrated experience leading positive change, empowering people, cultivating product technology visions and innovative solutions, and fostering effective engineering teams. Adept at articulating the product vision and drive the future roadmap with strong business acumen.
  • Passion for being at the leading edge of technology with a minimum of 8-12 years of hands-on software development experience (preferably AWS tech stack, Java)
  • Expertise in the Software design/architecture process
  • Experience with Agile development and methodologies and SaaS technologies.
  • Possesses strong verbal and written communication skills both in Hebrew and English
  • Preferably - experience working with global teams, especially in the US.
  • BSc/MSc in Computer Science or equivalent work-related experience

How you will lead

  • Technology leaders at Intuit think strategically and drive for results. They build high performing teams by putting the right people in the right job at the right time. Leaders help to innovate by thinking differently. They lead their teams to embrace new ideas that produce outstanding results for our customers. Leaders at Intuit inspire others thru action by creating a spirit of collaboration.
  • In this role you will help to bring out the best ideas from the best engineers by empowering them and leading by example.
  • Your team will create and bring customer driven software products to market that simplify and solve for current customer needs while building for the future.
  • To accomplish this, you will create a shared vision and build and maintain strong cross-functional relationships / alignment with partners across the business (e.g., Program Managers, Business Analyst and Development Managers cross the org).

Intuit Why Work With Us

Mission
  • Mission
  • Workplace & Culture
  • Engineering & Data
  • Career Areas
  • Social Impact
Mission
Workplace & Culture
Engineering & Data
Career Areas
Social Impact

Working at Intuit, youll be an important part of our mission to power prosperity around the world. We deliver on our mission by working to solve the most important financial problems for the customers and communities we serve. That means helping put more money in their pockets, eliminating work and drudgery so they can focus on their lives and what matters to them, and ensuring that they have complete confidence in every financial decision they make.

Our products and services are built on Intuit's AI-driven expert platform, combining the power of cutting-edge technology with live financial experts. Were using innovative technologies like AI, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing to develop groundbreaking products that deliver simple, delightful solutions across the full range of our customers financial lives.

  • TurboTax takes the complexity out of the tax code, helping people get the maximum refund they deserve.
  • Credit Karma helps people find the right financial products, putting more money in their pockets and providing financial expertise and insights.
  • Mint helps users to get a holistic view of their financial picture and make smart money decisions.
  • QuickBooks helps small businesses grow and run their business all in one place, including managing their books, getting paid fast, managing capital, and paying employees with confidence.
  • Mailchimp provides an all-in-one marketing platform that empowers small business customers to start and grow their businesses by helping them get their business online, market their business, and manage customer relationships.

Our mission-driven culture, dynamic team, and entrepreneurial spirit drives innovation that makes a real difference for millions of customers around the world.

Intuit Benefits

4.6
3 Ratings

Employer Summary

Intuit offers an amazing suite of benefits designed to support you and your family's health and well-being and provide the tools you need to learn, grow, and make an impact.

To start with, you'll be eligible for best-in-class medical, dental, and vision benefits on your first day of work. And our Well-Being for Life program offers reimbursement for many other expenses related to physical, emotional, family support and financial well-being. Health Savings Accounts and Life & Accident Insurance plans provide added peace of mind so you can focus on living your best life. Health and wellness is a top priority in our workplace as well. That's why we provide meditation and mindfulness programs and communities and most of our offices are equipped with state-of-the-art fitness centers managed by personal trainers that provide free group exercise classes and our cafes and break rooms provide healthy food options.

We're also committed to helping our employees stay financially fit, with benefits like free financial counseling, a generous 401(k) Savings Plan, and our Employee Stock Purchase Plan to help you pursue your own path to prosperity.

You'll also get solid support for your professional development at Intuit. With access to workshops, training events, and other educational resources, our culture of continuous learning will drive your professional growth.

*Please note that not all benefits apply for each location. To search for benefits that apply in your location, visit intuitbenefits.com.
